price: Na tulimuumba mtu kwa udongo unao toa sauti, unao tokana na matope yaliyo tiwa sura.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ
footnotes: Na Sisi katika kuumba kwetu walimwengu katika dunia hii, tumeumba namna mbili - Tumemuumba mtu kwa udongo mkavu wenye kutoa sauti ukigongwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-insāna min ṣalṣālin min ḥama-in masnūnin
